name: Memories of the Canyon
description:
Memories of the Canyon is a hiking game, made on Unreal Engine 4 by six students. It's a one player game using the third-person view and it focus on Exploration and Narration.  "And what if the canyon becomes your best friend ?" Hope, a young adult who has always dreamed of exploring de Canyon finally decides to take the plunge. On her way, she meets a mysterious woman who came out of nowhere named Cassie, who will push her to discover the many secrets of this land, over a journey marked by rich encounters, wich will forge her unforgettable memories. During your hike, you'll walk through various environnements, discover numerous panoramas, talk with different peoples, fill your diary with photos and drawings, find many treasures or lost objects and observe a lot of flora and fauna. Explore, talk with others, discover the nature and reach the top of the canyon ! Talk with others !
Discover panoramas ! Find lost treasures ! Watch the wild life ! Respect the environnement ! Fill and complete your diary ! And much more ! You can play the game with the keyboard & mouse or with the controller ! Producer  :  BESSY Florian Game Artist, Concept Artist  :  DANEL Rose Game designer, Sound Designer, Programmer  :  GRANDIN Thomas Lighting and VFX Artist  :  CALMETTES-SOMBRIS Mathis Animator, rig Artist  :  MONTI Dino 3D Modeler  :  SIT Valentin
